name: Bowlstar (WIP)
description:
Description

Bowlstar the wacky bowling game you waited for. It has local multiplayer (up to 6 players).

How to play:

A/D or Left/Right = move or rotate

R = toggle move/rotate

Space = confirm

Esc = quit

Blue alley = friction zone, in this zone your bowlingball applies the curve force.

Desclaimer:

The game is not ready yet, and some things are not here or just have a placeholder assigned, like...

-strike detection

-skip 2nd frame after a strike

-sound (all the sounds has a placeholder assigned)

-animations
